item.title: Battle of Waterloo 200th Reenactment
item.description:
Battle of Waterloo 200th Reenactment

On June 18-20, 2015, thousands of reenactors gathered at Waterloo to commemorate the bicentenary of one of the most important battles in European history. The battle took place on June 18, 1815, and the Allied forces under the Duke of Wellington defeated the French army under Napoleon Bonaparte.

item.title: Race to the Bridge 2013 Operation Market Garden
item.description:
Race to the Bridge 2013 Operation Market Garden

Race to the bridge is an annual commemoration tour of old army vehicles from Renkum to Doorwerth, Arnhem and Oosterbeek to the John Frost Bridge. Photos Here: https://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.379944342134409.1073741948.282933645168813&type=3 Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/Panzerpicture Facebook Group:https://www.facebook.com/groups/Panze... Twitter:https://twitter.com/panzerpicture
